response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premier product, which I believe could significantly enhance the efficiency and profitability of your operations. Given its exceptional capabilities and the unique value it offers, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at an exclusive price of $1,200,000. This offer is designed to provide you with substantial savings while ensuring you benefit fully from the product's features. I look forward to discussing how this investment can positively impact your business. Please let me know if you have any questions or require further information.", "product_price": 1200000}
